title.narrative: DR Congo - Quality and Relevance of Secondary and Tertiary Education Project

description.narrative: To (i) improve the teaching and learning of mathematics and science in general secondary education (ii) enhance the relevance of TVET in priority sectors at secondary and tertiary education levels and (iii) to provide a response in the case of an Eligible Crisis or Emergency.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Primary, Secondary, and Technical Education

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Amendment of "ArrêtE No. MINEPSP/CABMIN/0014/201" | Description :On or before one month after the EffectiveDate, the Recipient shall amend the ArrêtE No. MINEPSP/CABMIN/0014/2014 dated July 2, 2014 to include the overall coordination ofthe Project by CAT; all in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :30-Nov-2015

Finance Agreement :Annual Work Programs | Description :Recipient shall, no later than November 30 (of each year during Projectimplementation), prepare and furnish to IDA, an annual work program for implementation in the following calendar year, including:(a) detailed timetable for the sequencing and implementation of project activities; (b) types of expenditures required for suchactivities, a proposed financing plan and a budget. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Block Grants for TVET Institutions and Grant Agreements | Description :To facilitate the carrying out ofComponents 2.2 (ii) of the Project, the Recipient shall extend Block Grants to TVET Institutions under Grant Agreements with saidTVET Institutions, with terms and conditions approved by the IDA, which shall include, inter alia, the obligation for said TVETInstitutions to implement their respective school development plans, as approved by IDA. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Designate and maintain the Technical Assistance Unit (CAT) | Description :Recipient shall designate and maintainCAT, throughout the period of Project implementation, to be responsible for prompt and efficient overall coordination betweenMEPS-INC, MESU and METP, including the coordination of the preparation of Annual Work Programs, as further described in the ProjectOperations Manual. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Mid-Term review and Follow Up | Description :Recipient, through MEPS-INC, MESU and METP shall, by Sept. 30,2017: (i) carry out jointly with CAT and the Steering Committee, and IDA, a mid-term review of the implementation of operationsunder the Project, which shall cover the progress achieved in the implementation of the Project; and (ii) following such mid-termreview, act promptly and diligently to take any corrective action. | Due Date :30-Sep-2017Complied with June 3, 2019.

Finance Agreement :Project Operations Manual and Safeguard Documents | Description :Recipient shall carry out and shall cause theProject to be carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Project Operations Manual and the Safeguard Documents (and anysubsequent plan). Except as the Association shall otherwise agree, the Recipient shall not amend or waive the Project OperationsManual or the Safeguard Documents, or permit any such provision to be amended or waived. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Steering Committee | Description :Establish no later than one (1) month after the Effective Date and thereaftermaintain throughout the period of Project implementation the Steering Committee to provide overall strategic guidance and approvethe Annual Work Programs, with terms of reference, composition and powers acceptable to the Association, as further described inthe Project Operations Manual. | Due Date :30-Nov-2015
